env.title: Environment path
env.description:
Absolute path of your ROS binaries.
Keep it empty to use the default one.

master.title: Master launch file
master.description:
Absolute path of your launch file to initialize ROS master.
Keep it empty to use the default one.

workspaces.title: Workspaces colon seprated
workspaces.description:
Absolute path of your launch file to initialize ROS master.
Keep it empty to use the default one.
